data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Jorge Manuel Sousa.
Belenenses awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jorge Manuel Sousa signals a free kick to Belenenses.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Vila do Conde to check on Lica, who is grimacing with pain.
Rio Ave have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Rio Ave.
Lica has recovered and rejoins the match in Vila do Conde.
Belenenses needs to be cautious. Rio Ave have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
Throw-in for Belenenses at Estadio dos Arcos.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Manuel Sousa awards the away team a throw-in.
Rio Ave have a dangerous throw-in.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Jorge Manuel Sousa.
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
Jorge Manuel Sousa signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Belenenses.
Jorge Manuel Sousa signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Belenenses's half.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
In Vila do Conde, Silvestre Varela of Belenenses is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Belenenses.
Ball safe as Belenenses is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Vila do Conde Rio Ave's Mehdi Taremi is caught offside.
Free kick Rio Ave.
Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
Jorge Manuel Sousa signals a throw-in for Rio Ave, close to Belenenses's area.
In Vila do Conde a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Jorge Manuel Sousa.
In Vila do Conde Rio Ave drive forward through Mehdi Taremi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Belenenses.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Throw-in Rio Ave.
Important block from the Belenenses defence as Carlos Mane fires in a strike for Rio Ave.
Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Belenenses.
Jorge Manuel Sousa awards the home team a throw-in.
Rio Ave push forward at Estadio dos Arcos and Filipe Augusto gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Belenenses defence.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Jorge Manuel Sousa.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
Jorge Manuel Sousa signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Al Musrati.
Rio Ave's Al Musrati is back in action after a slight knock.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Mehdi Taremi (Rio Ave) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Belenenses at Estadio dos Arcos.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Vila do Conde.
Belenenses awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio dos Arcos.
Jorge Manuel Sousa signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
Rio Ave's Al Musrati gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Belenenses defender.
Ball safe as Belenenses is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Vila do Conde a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Filipe Augusto for Rio Ave has been booked by Jorge Manuel Sousa and receives a first yellow card.
In Vila do Conde a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Rio Ave.
Throw-in high up the field for Rio Ave in Vila do Conde.
Throw-in for Belenenses close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Belenenses.
Jorge Manuel Sousa awards Belenenses a goal kick.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio dos Arcos.
Free kick Belenenses.
Jorge Manuel Sousa signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Belenenses's Mateo Cassierra gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vila do Conde.
Rio Ave make their first substitution with Gelson Dala replacing Tarantini.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rio Ave's Diogo Figueiras breaks free at Estadio dos Arcos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Jorge Manuel Sousa awards Belenenses a goal kick.
Jorge Manuel Sousa signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
Attention is being given to Rio Aveâ€™s Al Musrati and play has been suspended briefly.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Rio Ave's Al Musrati looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Jorge Manuel Sousa.
Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
It seems as if Al Musrati is unable to continue. Leandro da Silva Alves replaces him for the home team.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
Marco Matias is replacing Silvestre Varela for the away team.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Belenenses's Nuno Pina has been booked in Vila do Conde.
Goal kick for Belenenses at Estadio dos Arcos.
Free kick for Belenenses in the half of Rio Ave.
In Vila do Conde Belenenses attack through Tiago Esgaio. The finish is off target, however.
Rio Ave have a goal kick.
Jorge Manuel Sousa awards the home team a throw-in.
Rio Ave are in shooting range from this free kick.
Danny Henriques is booked for the away team.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Carlos Carvalhal is making the team's third substitution at Estadio dos Arcos with Bruno Moreira replacing Carlos Mane.
The away team have replaced Marco Matias with Alhassane Keita. This is the second substitution made today by Petit.
Nilton of Belenenses gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vila do Conde.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
Jorge Manuel Sousa awards Belenenses a goal kick.
Can Belenenses capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rio Ave's half?
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
Jorge Manuel Sousa signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
Rio Ave pushes forward through [47], whose finish on goal is saved.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Jorge Manuel Sousa.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Belenenses at Estadio dos Arcos.
Free kick Belenenses.
Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Belenenses.
Jorge Manuel Sousa signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
At Estadio dos Arcos, Matheus Reis has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Rio Ave's Bruno Moreira is whistled for offside at Estadio dos Arcos.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Belenenses.
Jorge Manuel Sousa signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Belenenses's half.
At Estadio dos Arcos the fourth official shows that 6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
Belenenses awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Rio Ave!
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Belenenses have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
In Vila do Conde a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
Petit (Belenenses) is making a third substitution, with Ruben Lima replacing Lica.
Nuno Santos (Rio Ave) has received a yellow card from Jorge Manuel Sousa.
Marco Matias (Belenenses) has received a first yellow card.
[10] ([11]) has received a yellow card from [28].
